MainLayout.description: A dynamic web portfolio developed with Next.js and React, designed to showcase the projects, skills, and professional experience of a web developer. It implements a modern and optimized architecture for smooth and responsive navigation, with support for dark and light themes, internationalization, and instant static deployment.

MainSection.catchphrase: Crafting Digital Experiences with Code and Creativity
MainSection.introduction01: I am a front-end developer with a strong background and experience in Industrial Engineering, holding a degree from the National University of Colombia. I specialize in using Next.js as my primary tool to create modern and dynamic web experiences.
MainSection.introduction02: My web development training has been guided by some of the most influential figures in the industry, such as Stephen Grider, Maximilian SchwarzmÃ¼ller, and Jonas Schmedtmann, through their renowned courses on Udemy. Additionally, I have honed my skills with the iconic book *JavaScript: The Definitive Guide* by David Flanagan and *Learning TypeScript* by Josh Goldberg, which have enabled me to design and develop visually appealing and highly functional websites.

HomePage.sectionTitleCatchPhrase: Modern tools for a world in constant change.
HomePage.sectionTitleSubtext: A stack highly adaptable to the needs of speed, a great development experience, and maintainability.
HomePage.sectionTitleSubtextEducation: Thanks to my experience in industrial engineering, project management, and team leadership, I not only offer technical solutions but also bring a strategic approach that adds value to any project I am involved in.
HomePage.finalSentence: I am currently expanding my knowledge in Node.js and PostgreSQL, aiming to develop robust, maintainable, and fast web applications aligned with industry best standards and practices.

ExperienceTimeline.job1: Management of all technical aspects of the automotive diagnostic center. Personnel management. Responsible for inspections and technical maintenance of computer equipment. Quality Coordinator and Project Manager for the company.
ExperienceTimeline.job2: Creation of custom landing pages on demand with Next.js

AboutPortfolioModalContent.portfolioDescription: This site was designed from scratch (no templates used), learning along the way various essential technologies for a website or web app, such as dark theme and internationalization. In the source code, you will find a guide on how the project is structured, a commit history (in Spanish), and comments throughout the code in both English and Spanish.

projectsPage.sectionTitleSubtext: Created for real clients, showcasing a range of web development skills.
projectsPage.finalSentence: I aim to avoid reinventing the wheel or blindly copying and pasting code. Instead, I prioritize adhering to standards and best practices, as they are essential allies in building effective web applications.

MALEPETinfo.projectInfo: Landing page of the local informational website about hiring pet care services, containing links to various social media platforms, fully responsive, and supporting theme switching.
